intent_atoms.description: MappedReader must perform bounds-checked slicing and prevent out-of-range requests.
MappedReader should gracefully fallback when memory mapping is unavailable.
MappedReaderTests cover full and partial reads, zero-length slices, missing files, and boundary enforcement.
Memory-mapped RandomAccessReader implementation was added in Sources/ISOInspectorKit/IO/MappedReader.swift.

functional_units.name: MappedReader
functional_units.description: Provides a memory-mapped RandomAccessReader implementation that reads file contents via Data(contentsOf:options:.mappedIfSafe) with bounds-checked slicing and graceful fallback when mapping is unavailable.
